text.text: We provide the full suite of servivces needed on-site for an active exploration program.
What services do you need on site?
You will likely need to strip, trench, pressure wash and create drill pads to begin.
What other types of field work are needed?
From the initial data received you will need to do geological mapping, take samples, and continue prospecting.
How do you manage a Drill program?
You need to get your drillhole targets to plan a program, and from there you build a 3d model. You will also require geological logging with drillcore transport and storage.
Depending on your specific needs you may need additional sampling, and some level of assessment reporting to remain in good standing.
